name: Echarts
tagline: ECharts is a state machine-based programming language for event-driven systems derived from the standardized UML Statecharts language. ECharts distinguishes itself from other Statecharts dialects by focussing on implementation issues such as determinism and code re-use. ECharts is a hosted language which means that it is dependent on an underlying programming language such as Java.
body:
ECharts

[Core Algorithms/State Machines]

Programming language for creating applications based on sophisticated state machines. Translates to Java. Eclipse plugin available as alpha software.

Supports:
  • Concurrent state machines
  • Nested parameterized state machines
  • Dynamically-created state machines (machine arrays)
